name: Man VS Monster
description:
Man VS Monster is a simple casual 2 player game I made over the course of around 4 weeks for a school course! The goal was to test my design skills and make a game that is hopefully fun to play!

The controls:

The "human" player is the green cube and has to survive for 45 seconds!: 

  • A & D for movement
  • W for jump
  • S to fall down blue platforms
  • Space to dash

The "monster" player controls the yellow arms and has to grab the human with their yellow arms! They use the mouse to aim and use M1 for the left arm and M2 to use the right arm. Pressing the same buttons after "grabbing" returns the arms and allows the player to "grab" again.
